rows.label: tlk70000070_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I hear that the capital city was
attacked, just like Felt Village.

rows.label: tlk70000070_03_msg0002
rows.name:
We just want to go about our own
business in peace. Why's this sort of
thing gotta go and happen?

rows.label: tlk70000070_03_msg0003
rows.name:
It's times like these I wish our knight
would come riding in to protect us.

rows.label: tlk70000070_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, you don't know? It's an old story,
but the innkeeper says he remembers.
Of course, he was only a boy then.

rows.label: tlk70000070_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Apparently someone from this village
ended up getting knighted. That's really
all I know, but it's a nice thought.

rows.label: tlk70000070_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Still, it's hard to believe a knight could
come from a place like this, so it might
just be a story...
